website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking to avoid breakage, Better Braids will deliver.
pros: Better Braid's active ingredient is salicylic acid, which can help keep hair strong
Since hair is especially breakage-prone when braided, this is a nice bonus
Some buyers also say the spray helps with braid take down
cons: One of the pricier braid sprays on the market

customer_reviews.title: Awesomw product
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don't write reviews. But this product is phenomenal. I have 4c hair. I know this product is for braids but I use the product with or without braids. I use it for twist out and my everyday styling needs. As I started earlier I have 4c hair. I use to apply oils and hair grease to moisturize my hair. My hair was oily, but not hydrated. Sometimes my hair would still feel hard despite all the oils and hair grease. But with better braids my hair feels so soft and It brings out my curl pattern. My hair has grown since I started using the product this way.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha King

customer_reviews.title: Be wary!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product contains Coumarin, which is a liver damaging chemical. I also broke out into a severe skin rash a week after taking. Threw it out immediately, be warned and look up ALL ingredients before you buy!!
customer_reviews.author: jar0706

customer_reviews.title: ... this spray since 1999 and it has been the best braid spray that I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I've used this spray since 1999 and it has been the best braid spray that I have ever used. It seems to make my hair grow faster and keeps my scalp and hair moisturized. I use it and I don't even wear braids just to freshen up my hair and give it a nice sheen. Love this product and will continue to use it always. I have tried other products that just seem to ruin my hair, but as soon as I use this again it's like my hair says, "YES, THANK YOU"! I would recommend this to anyone who is natural, texlaxed, or transitioning. It will be your hairs best friend.
customer_reviews.author: MamiCurves

customer_reviews.title: Great medicated braid spray
customer_reviews.text: Relieved my itchy mini twists immediately (not in love with the hair my braided used for this style). Smells great. The spray nozzle does not give me the fine even spray I prefer so I just pour it in another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It relieves tight braids and weaves and gets stops that terrible itching associated with those types of hair styles. Even though it is medicated it does not have that "medicated" smell!
customer_reviews.author: deby46

customer_reviews.title: Best braid spray ever
customer_reviews.text: Love what this product does my braids, have use it for years, I've tried other products and none of them does the job, this product stops the itching instantly and it keep my hair moisturized!
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Still itches
customer_reviews.text: Smells good but hair still itches even after I spray it on
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: always a favorite. keeps hair nicely moisturized without being overly greasy
customer_reviews.author: kdb

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Best hair spray in the world .. every other braid spray never worked for me .. this is amazing !!
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. keeps braids week moisturised and easy to remove too.
customer_reviews.author: AAA

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite braid spray. It keeps my hair moisturized without leaving that (all too noticeable greasy residue) along the edges. It also smells really good!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received excellent results that helped with the itching of the synthetic hair.
customer_reviews.author: Clotine Collins

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok... it’s not a great spray but it works well in a pinch. I’m still trying to figure out what is medicated about it. I expected a cooling sensation that didn’t happen ... but it did keep scalp moisturized while I’m cornrows.
customer_reviews.author: RaeMcGee

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair healthy and moisturized! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my hair very soft and manageable after I take down my braids. I put it in a bottle with a fine tip nozzle so I can reach my scalp to keep it healthy and moisturized while it’s in braids. I have less breakage and my hair smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dollhouse girl

customer_reviews.title: Good for braided hair
customer_reviews.text: From a couple hours after use, not only does it smell well, but it leaves your hair very soft. It helps with itching and when its time to remove the braids, the texture is so manageable. I have used it for years and it is my go to for braids.
customer_reviews.author: SachaLips

customer_reviews.title: Use this all the time as a perfect detangler for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time as a perfect detangler for my hair. Using it for over 8 years now. Makes your hair soft and mine shrinks because of the moisture.
customer_reviews.author: pugsy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. This the only product I will continue to buy and trust with my hair. It promotes hair growth, softens your hair and adds a nice shine. I get compliments about my hair, but using this product just put it over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a gift to a friend. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Keeps conditioner build up away and keeps my hair from dreading. My only complaint is the smell, I don't particularly like it but it's not horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Marie L.

customer_reviews.title: best braid spray ever
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product personally since I first became aware of it. I also recommend it to friends and whenever I do someone's hair. This is a great product, it does not build up on the hair, and it addresses problems with the scalp and hair. Using this product does not give you the "lint" build up you see on some braid styles, and they have a full line of products to use on the hair. The stores where I usually purchase this product have stopped carrying it, ie., Sally's Beauty Supply, so I have had to resort to looking online for the product. If you try this product line you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Alexander

customer_reviews.title: better braids
customer_reviews.text: It gave me the results I expected and I would buy it again. I will definitely recommend it to anyone who has braids
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Soothed itch for days with first application
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Got itchy scalp from braids for the first time after decades of getting my hair braided (be wary of hair retailers on Amazon, esp those advertising 100% Kanekalon hair), and this soothed the itch with first application. Idk about paying $15! Price gouging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many many years. It for some reason has become more difficult to find in stores however I def think it worth it. Not just for braids though, your actual hair will be softer because of it and I have thick 4c hair. It makes my hair extremely soft and springy. Every 4c girl should give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle mathisom

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I wished that I found this product sooner. I have my hair natural in box braids, and not only does it moisturize your hair and condition your scalp, it also helps your hair to grow. I've used this product since June and my hair has grown about 4 inches. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone with ethnic hair.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We always purchase our hair products from Amazon. We love this line for hair care. We will be purchasing more. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: keepingitreal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it been use for 25 years nothing is better then this product
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: The product had a positive Staphylococcus aureus test result.
customer_reviews.text: This product was recalled in 2016 by the lab who makes the product (keystone labs) because of Microbial Contamination of a Non-Sterile Products: The product had a positive Staphylococcus aureus test result.
customer_reviews.author: mzsierra

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Smells great too
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY really medicated braid spray on the market. I love it! Smells great too!
customer_reviews.author: Delphine R.

product_meta.title: Better Braids Medicated Braid Spray, 12 Fluid Ounce
feature_bullets: Excellent for braids and natural hairstyles
